name: Aetkaenyk, The Mindbreaker
text:
When Aetkaenyk, The Mindbreaker is put into a graveyard from anywhere, you may pay 4 life. If you do, look at the top four cards of your library and separate them into a face-down pile and a face-up pile. An opponent chooses one of those piles. Put the chosen pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

{g}{u}{b}: Put Aetkaenyk, The Mindbreaker into your library fourth from the top from your graveyard.
